levelList.name: Разрезатель вселенных
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[BeforeAttack] At less than 10 <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Заряд</link></u></color> Count, consume 15% HP to gain +10 <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Заряд</link></u></color> Count (this damage does not reduce this unit's HP to 0; rounded down)
[BeforeAttack] Consume up to 40 <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Заряд</link></u></color> Count and deal +1% more damage for every <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Заряд</link></u></color> Count consumed (max 10%)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 <sprite name="Agility"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Agility">Спешка</link></u></color> and 1 <sprite name="ChargeLoad"><color=#f8c200><u><link="ChargeLoad">Нагрузка</link></u></color> next turn for every <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Заряд</link></u></color> (max 1 of each per Skill)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 <sprite name="Agility"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Agility">Спешка</link></u></color> and 1 <sprite name="ChargeLoad"><color=#f8c200><u><link="ChargeLoad">Нагрузка</link></u></color> next turn for every <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Заряд</link></u></color> (max <style="highlight">2</style> of each per Skill)

levelList.name: Магическая пуля
levelList.desc:
Deal +1% more damage for every 3 <sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Огонь</link></u></color> on target (max 10%)
[BeforeAttack] At 0 <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color>, gain 1 <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color>.
- <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color> value determines the bullet to fire.
· <sprite name="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_1st"><color=#f8c200><u><link="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_1st">Первая Магическая пуля</link></u></color>
· <sprite name="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_2nd"><color=#f8c200><u><link="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_2nd">Вторая Магическая пуля</link></u></color>
· <sprite name="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_3rd"><color=#f8c200><u><link="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_3rd">Третья Магическая пуля</link></u></color>
· <sprite name="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_4th"><color=#f8c200><u><link="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_4th">Четвёртая Магическая пуля</link></u></color>
· <sprite name="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_5th"><color=#f8c200><u><link="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_5th">Пятая Магическая пуля</link></u></color>
· <sprite name="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_6th"><color=#f8c200><u><link="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_6th">Шестая Магическая пуля</link></u></color>
· <sprite name="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_7th"><color=#f8c200><u><link="FreishutzOutisEgoBullet_7th">Седьмая Магическая пуля</link></u></color>
[EndSkill] Gain <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color> equal to the highest Reson. (min. 1, max 4)
[EndSkill] If the main target is defeated, inflict 2 <sprite name="DarkFlame"><color=#e30000><u><link="DarkFlame">Тёмное пламя</link></u></color> against all enemies with <sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Огонь</link></u></color>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict <sprite name="DarkFlame"><color=#e30000><u><link="DarkFlame">Тёмное пламя</link></u></color> equal to <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color> (once per turn for each unit)

levelList.name: Магическая пуля
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
Deal +<style="highlight">3</style>% more damage for every 3 <sprite name="Combustion"><color=#e30000><u><link="Combustion">Огонь</link></u></color> on target (max <style="highlight">30</style>%)
[BeforeAttack] At 0 <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color>, gain 1 <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color>.
- <sprite name="FreischutzShotCount"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="FreischutzShotCount">Магическая пуля</link></u></color> value determines the bullet to fire.
